holidays.title: National Lazy Day
holidays.description: In today's plugged-in world, we have a day when we don't have to do anything.

holidays.title: National Spoil Your Dog Day
holidays.description: It might be a sickness but we're stupid in love with our dogs!

holidays.title: Abai Day
holidays.description: Grab Abai Kunanbaiuly’s poetry book and celebrate Abai Day in Kazakhstan today!

holidays.title: Ascent of Saint Dominic
holidays.description: Take to the streets and join the colorful parade on the Ascent of Saint Dominic!

holidays.title: Duran Duran Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let’s find out more and celebrate the Duran Duran band on this national holiday.

holidays.title: Ecuador Independence Day
holidays.description: Learn how Ecuadorians managed to declare sovereignty and how to celebrate this festivity.

holidays.title: Herbert Hoover Day
holidays.description: Join the birth anniversary celebration of the 31st U.S. president on Herbert Hoover Day!

holidays.title: International Biodiesel Day
holidays.description: Let’s find out what the best fuel is for vehicles, which causes the least environmental damage.

holidays.title: National Connecticut Day
holidays.description: Let’s take this opportunity to honor and learn about the fifth state to join the U.S.

holidays.title: National Dean Day
holidays.description: Learn more about Dean and the people in history going by this name.

holidays.title: National Mary Day
holidays.description: To all the Marys of the world, rejoice! It’s a merry day for you all.

holidays.title: National S’mores Day
holidays.description: We honor the most commonly packed camping snack!

holidays.title: National Shapewear Day
holidays.description: National Shapewear Day takes place on August 10 to celebrate and appreciate slimming garments.

holidays.title: National SKI Citrus Soda Day
holidays.description: Grab your favorite citrus-flavored SKI soda drink this National SKI Citrus Soda Day!

holidays.title: Update Your Bio Day
holidays.description: Open your laptop, update your resumé, and find your dream job this Update Your Bio Day!

holidays.title: Vlogging Day
holidays.description: Vlogging Day is celebrated on August 10 around the world to appreciate vloggers.

holidays.title: World Lion Day
holidays.description: Protect the wild cat’s roar — raise your voice for endangered lions this World Lion Day.

holidays.title: Alycia Bellamy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This pop singer is blonde forever! Celebrate her special day with us right here!

holidays.title: Chris Marek’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate the birthday of Chris Marek from “Little People, Big World” with us!

holidays.title: Jacob Latimore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the birthday of this multi-talented actor and singer.

holidays.title: Kylie Jenner’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Kylie Jenner, the amazing businesswoman, socialite, model, and influencer, she’s already hit gold.

holidays.title: Maci Bookout’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented reality star, Maci Bookout, the sky's definitely the limit and nothing less.

holidays.title: Sunny Suljic’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this super talented actor, everything Suljic touches turns to gold. Celebrate his special day today.
